title: Last night my phone took an update for Android 10, and I have lost the ability to receive calls
content:
Phone does not ring when receiving a call and then I just get a voicemail notification, also when I try to retrieve email messages using the Google mail off my Gmail, the app just shuts down.  it will also not let me select a ringtone sound for the phone to ring.

I have checked the do not disturb settings I also have rebooted the phone. I currently have no apps blocking any communication whatsoever.
